import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; export default function Home({ setActivePage }) { const services = [ { key: "implants", icon: "ðŸ¦·", title: "Dental Implants", desc: "Permanent replacement for missing teeth", }, { key: "cleaning", icon: "âœ¨", title: "Dental Cleaning", desc: "Professional teeth cleaning & care", }, { key: "braces", icon: "ðŸ˜¬", title: "Braces & Aligners", desc: "Straighten your teeth", }, { key: "whitening", icon: "ðŸ˜", title: "Teeth Whitening", desc: "Brighten your smile", }, { key: "rct", icon: "ðŸ’‰", title: "Root Canal Treatment", desc: "Save infected teeth with RCT", }, ]; const testimonials = [ { name: "Priya Sharma", img: "/patients/priya.jpg", opinion: "I was nervous about getting dental implants, but Dr. Desai and his team made the process painless and smooth. My smile looks amazing!", treatment: "Dental Implants", }, { name: "Rahul Patil", img: "/patients/rahul.jpg", opinion: "The clinic is very clean and modern. I got my braces here and the results are fantastic. Highly recommend Desai Dental Clinic!", treatment: "Braces & Aligners", }, { name: "Asha Kulkarni", img: "/patients/asha.jpg", opinion: "I had a root canal done and it was completely pain-free. The staff is friendly and caring. Best dental experience ever!", treatment: "Root Canal Treatment", }, { name: "Vikram Joshi", img: "/patients/vikram.jpg", opinion: "Teeth whitening gave me so much confidence. The doctor explained everything clearly and the results were instant.", treatment: "Teeth Whitening", }, ]; const slides = [ { type: "text" }, { type: "image", src: "/happyPatient.jpg", caption: "Our patients love us!", }, { type: "image", src: "/clinic.jpg", caption: "Visit our state-of-the-art clinic", }, ]; const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % slides.length); }, 4000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [slides.length]); return (
